snippet: A bipartisan group of senators is coalescing around an ambitious three-step process to avert automatic tax increases and deep spending cuts facing the country in January.
abstract: Bipartisan group of senators is coalescing around an ambitious three-step process to avert a series of automatic tax increases and deep spending cuts facing the country in January 2013; group is opting to try for a post-election session of Congress to reach agreement on a comprehensive deficit reduction deal rather than a short term solution.
lead_paragraph: A bipartisan group of senators is coalescing around an ambitious three-step process to avert automatic tax increases and deep spending cuts facing the country in January.

headline.seo: Senate Leaders at Work on Plan to Avert Automatic Cuts
headline.main: Leaders at Work on Plan to Avert Mandatory Cuts
headline.print_headline: Senate Leaders See Path To Advert Mandatory Cuts
